snippet.title: Kamla - Launch Trailer | Survival Horror Set In India
snippet.description:
Kamla is a first-person survival horror game set in 1970s India. Based on traditional Indian folklore, you play as a tantrik (Indian priest). Your goal is to exorcise a newly wed bride named Kamla by completing a ritual and solving puzzles.

► Download On Steam - http://steam.pm/app/2585270
► Join MadMantraGames Discord -  https://discord.gg/FHTuBXFzXx 

[LAUNCH DISCOUNT UNTIL 14 MAY]
#KamlaGame #GameplayTeaser #kamla #indiangamingcommunity #Indiangamer #gamesmadeinindia #madeinindia #horrorvideogames #horrorgameplay #horror
